A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ruined everything established in the last film. Character arcs watered down. The whole movie is the most drawn out logic-defying chase scene ever to be brought to cinemas...Being a star wars fan since my youth\, I can honestly say this film was everything I hoped it wouldn't be\, and it's severely tarnished the new Star Wars trilogy and ultimately the universe as a whole...\n\nAnd I reeaaaaaally wanted to like this movie...
